name: Moon Monument
description:
My first time working with proper 3D tools like pro builder and the game was supposed to be longer but I ran out of time on the game jam :(

The theme was "Sun and Moon" so the idea was that you were the moon and were trying to reach the sky and you would have to solve puzzles (but like I said, I didn't have enough time to do that!)

I "borrowed" the cube pathfinding code from the Mix and Jam youtube channel and used music I found on the asset store named Ash Valley Cybernetics LITE by Neal Bond so massive thanks to those two!

Everything else like the terrible music at the end was done by me though!

Hope you enjoyed it! (even though it takes 30 seconds to complete)
